channel.title: Problem Cant Fix Help
channel.description:
Hello i having this problem. It starts when i go to barrows and go underground and attack one of the NPC'S it pushs me back through the wall and wont stop, i still attack but im being pushed back. When this happens i get this ERROR:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mrhjY.png[/img]
Much appreciated.

item.title: Problem Cant Fix Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Has to do with the direction the player is facing.

if (dir != -1 && (dir & 1) != 0) {
Means ^ was true.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem Cant Fix Help
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

When the client laggs; instead of walking back (like rs) it just disconnects you, so you don’t appear in the wrong place for other clients.

So either fix the current algorithm to use walk backs or add fully server-sided pathfinding.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem Cant Fix Help
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

that’s not an uncaught error look for that in the source and figure out what causes it to do that and why

Read full topic
